name: American Classic Muscle Car
description:
Offroad Classic American Muscle Cars Driving is composed of various game play modes like free mode & time challenge. You can use all the 4 wheels vehicles by unlocking. Various offroad tracks add more adventure to this already difficult game. So enjoy the offroad adventure with modern muscle cars on curvy roads.

Cross curvy hurdles carefully and reach the destination successfully to complete the game levels. Classic Muscle Cars Driving is the brand new modern racing game with the most advanced technology. Drive carefully and apply brakes where necessary to avoid car crashes. Classic Muscle Cars are Ready for Offroad Dirt Adventure on Curvy Roads.

Features:

- Hours of fun with this game everyday
- Original sounds and natural environments
- Deadly tracks for American Classic Muscles car
- V8 engine sounds and easy controls
- Different locations.and interesting missions
- Real physics engine game with perfect driving
